name: knjIRC-framework
short_description: A PHP-GTK2-class for connecting to, and manipulating with, an IRC-server. Unlike most PHP-IRC-classes, knj_irc accepts the connect()-methods known from PHP-GTK for handeling events like joins, kicks and more...
